name: Joker's War
description:
Joker's War, my own spin on the classic card game War.
Draw three cards and set them in the three zones in front of the towers. Then once your done setting the cards they're compared to the AI placed cards. The face value winner gets both cards. Damage is calculated by looking at the suits, subtracting 1 or 2 to the losing suit's value and then taking the difference between the higher value and subtracting it from the corresponding tower's health of the loser.
There's a better explanation in the "Please Read" file.
I would LOVE to hear any feedback and hope that you guys enjoy what I have made so far.
